name: Warbital Mass
description:
Warbital Mass is a local multiplayer, arcade style arena game where the object of the game is to destroy the other players. Collect asteroids into your orbit and "spin-up" to fire them at the enemy.

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move and hold down the adjacent shift key to fire, also works with controllers.

This is only the test version of the game so there is only one level and mode, more levels will follow when we have tested and made changes to the game.  Please provide feedback.
